original_text: And when they had crucified him, they divided his garments among them by casting lots.
korean_text: 그들이 예수를 십자가에 못 박은 후에 그 옷을 제비 뽑아 나누고

sentences.original_text: And when they had crucified him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 그를 십자가에 못 박았을 때,

sentences.original_text: they divided his garments among them
